content.text:
Here is my response formatted as requested:

<OUTPUT_TEXT>

# Enforcing Administration Policies and Rules for Students

1. Familiarize yourself with policies
   - Review school handbook and code of conduct
   - Attend staff meetings on policy updates
   - Consult administration with questions

2. Communicate expectations clearly
   - Review rules with students at start of year
   - Post key policies visibly in classroom
   - Remind students of rules as needed

3. Be consistent in enforcement
   - Apply rules fairly to all students
   - Follow through on stated consequences
   - Document rule violations

4. Use positive reinforcement
   - Recognize students following rules
   - Implement reward systems for good behavior
   - Model expected conduct

5. Address violations promptly
   - Intervene quickly for minor infractions
   - Refer serious violations to administration
   - Communicate with parents as appropriate

6. Promote a positive classroom culture
   - Foster mutual respect and responsibility
   - Encourage student ownership of rules
   - Create opportunities for leadership

7. Seek support when needed
   - Consult colleagues on challenging situations
   - Involve counselors or administrators for ongoing issues
   - Participate in professional development on classroom management

</OUTPUT_TEXT>
